override.description:
Turns the box tool on or off.
Args: p0: 'toggle'
* ON * OFF
Examples: | ensight.tools.box("ON")
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error

Turns the cursor tool on or off.
Args: p0: 'toggle'
* ON * OFF
Examples: | ensight.tools.cursor("ON")
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error

Determines the domain to blank out elements using the element blank tool.
Args: p0: '' inside p1: '' outside
Examples: | ensight.tools.element_blank_domain("inside") | ensight.tools.element_blank_domain("outside")
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error

Determines the domain layer to blank out elements using the element blank tool.
Args: p0: '' top p1: '' all
Examples: | ensight.tools.element_blank_layer("top") | ensight.tools.element_blank_layer("all")
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error

Turns the line tool on or off.
Args: p0: 'toggle'
* ON * OFF
Examples: | ensight.tools.line("ON")
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error

This command has not yet been documented.
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error

This command has not yet been documented.
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error

Turns the plane tool on or off.
Args: p0: 'option'
* ON * OFF * LINE * FILLED
Examples: | ensight.tools.plane("ON")
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error

turns the quadric tool on or off.
Args: p0: 'option'
* CYLINDER * SPHERE * CONE * REVOLUTION * NONE
Examples: | ensight.tools.quadric("SPHERE")
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error

Turns the selection tool on or off.
Args: p0: 'toggle'
* ON * OFF
Examples: | ensight.tools.select_tool("ON")
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error
